website_summaries.verdict: A villain that Dragon Ball fans love to hate, Frieza’s twisted personality is on full display via this complex and detailed figure, and contorting him into favorite poses is a breeze.
pros: Includes 3 expressive heads, 8 hands, 4 feet, and multiple accessories

customer_reviews.title: This an amazing figure!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into this line of figures and missed out on the originals, including the 1.0 Frieza (Freeza in Japan). So I quickly decided to purchase this re-release and I am glad I did. The sculpt is just like the original just slightly modified, especially in the head. He has excellent blue shading throughout, which makes the figure pop. Frieza comes packed with accessories as you can see in my pics. Looks great with the Warrior Awakening Goku figure. Overall, I'm highly satisfied with my purchase. This figure is a must if you missed the 1.0, are a fan of Frieza, or just like cool figures👌
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two and got em both today so I gave one to my friend that will leave my workplace next week and he loved this. I will miss my friend hopefully this ...
customer_reviews.text: My first freeza and it is phenomenon, I ordered two and got em both today so I gave one to my friend that will leave my workplace next week and he loved this. I will miss my friend hopefully this will last him a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Figure
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the figure. Since it is white be wary of it getting dirty. The feet and belly attract the most marks. Both seem easy enough to gently wipe off. Other than that it is a fantastic figure of one of my favorite villains.
customer_reviews.author: Legends55Neverdie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this frieza! Great for gifts. Collections.
customer_reviews.text: Figure was amazing and looks awesome! Just like the anime tv show and good in size! A very impressive frieza with good accessories and durable, flexible joints!
customer_reviews.author: Skyangel1014

customer_reviews.title: Small but excellent
customer_reviews.text: This figure will seem pretty small but that doesn't take away from how excellent this figure is. Good articulation and a good amount of additional accessories like hands, heads and beam blasts (and a Halo based off his look in later DB Super episodes). Frieza here has good paint detailing as well. Overall I'm very satisfied with him as a figure, maybe one day we will get a 100 percent full powered appearance. (Side note: This arrived right on time)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Murray

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than the first S.H. Figuarts Frieza
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2.0 version of Frieza because the original one is just too expensive. And let me tell you, at least in my humble opinion, that the newer version of Frieza just looks so much better than the original. The overall colors of the new Frieza looks better than the old one. Although the older Frieza’s face plates to me they look just a little more better than the newer version. But hey, at least we have this new version at a lower price! I just wish they could’ve released the same face plates as the old one, but this is just my opinion. This figure is a good buy and I totally recommend it 💯%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manami

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. This comes with a clear stand and two ki blasts which is great since older Tamashii Nations DBZ figures come as just a figure. With the added elements the price is definitely worth it. The paint on the shoulders could be better. That amd the fact that Amazon led me to believe that I was to receive this item on June 6th only to be tild it will be delivered the next week and again the next is why it's a 4/5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Figure is good quality. Wish it was a little taller.
customer_reviews.text: This figure looks and feels great. Seems a really short compared to the other figures, even for Frieza. Definitely still a good figure, but $30 range seems a bit more appropriate for this one. Had I seen it in person, I probably wouldn't have bought it, but I'm not mad that I did either.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Frieza is one of my all time favorite Dragon Ball Z characters so I had to add him to my collection. He came perfect, brand new, no problems at all. He’s very posable and sturdy. The paint is also gorgeous and I see no faults. The packaging is official and is completely new. He looks amazing in my collection, I recommend him to any DBZ Frieza fan!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Stuck joints
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken!! The leg joint snapped right off and his halo was ripped at the peg straight out of the box , i am not happy at all!!
customer_reviews.author: carlos torres

customer_reviews.title: Real figure not a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Awesome accessories and such a small figure! Small in a good way. Frieza is slightly taller than SS Awakening Goku’s belt line. Perfect accuracy to anime.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great figure, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This figure is amazing! The articulation is good, as is the painting. This figure definitely does Frieza justice, especially with the accessories. The sheer amount of detail on Frieza's angriest face, specifically the bulging veins, is astounding. I definitely recommend this figure to any fan of Frieza.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Figure for Frieza
customer_reviews.text: Excellent representation, I think it might be just a smidge too short though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Despite not having upgraded hips this figure holds up and makes for a great reissue. The new head sculpts look sweet and as much as I'd thought the hole for Freeza's halo would annoy me it's actually rather discreet and well positioned. Having missed the first version of Figuarts' Freeza I was excited to finally get my hands on one for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Master Dave

customer_reviews.title: Help me stand the figure
customer_reviews.text: The figure is great but there are some problems. I cant seem to stand the figure with the tail and there are some purple paint on the white skin on the torso. Anyone else having these problems or ia it just me?
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very articulate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson, he loves it and has gotten many hours of enjoyment with it!
customer_reviews.author: Barlow08

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool figure. Glad they released a new version of this guy because the original is way too expensive. Good amount of accessories and awesome blast affects. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jean kirstein

customer_reviews.title: Better than the first release
customer_reviews.text: It sacrifices some accessories like the rock for him to stand on but the color it much better and you get the halo.
customer_reviews.author: drownedsnow

customer_reviews.title: Still a good figure just bad paint job
customer_reviews.text: The figure wasnt painted that good it had a few marks around the arms and the purple edges of the figure weren't finished colored
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing figure!!!! Looks great, easy to pose, joints are very good. Great all the way around. Only problem is that, the figure is kinda turning blue.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality Frieza figure
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant quality Frieza figure, at a good price too at the time of Preorder purchase. Fast shipping to NZ too! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mckee

customer_reviews.title: As usual, the best figures
customer_reviews.text: Sh Figuarts are simply incredible. Best Freeza figure in all possible ways
customer_reviews.author: Pablo S

customer_reviews.title: If you dont have it, grab it.
customer_reviews.text: Just started collecting SH figuarts DBZ and this Frieza was a must cop and I can say easily worth the asking price especially with the accessories it comes with. Paint job is solid. The blue shading may look a little weird at first but under the right lighting, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Schwann187

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for DBZ Fans
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best Frieza action figure out there. The sculpting, paint applications, joints, and articulations are excellent and it comes with a decent amount of accessories, too. If you missed out on the original release, you should definitely get this one.
customer_reviews.author: infinite_tsukuyomi

customer_reviews.title: Bruh
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the legs on my Frieza came out so stiff to the point I accidentally broke one of its damn legs. Cause I was curious on why weren’t the legs movable.
customer_reviews.author: YoshiKira00

customer_reviews.title: Grad gift for friend
customer_reviews.text: It was in great condition and everything they wanted! Would buy again. Not scam like last one I tried to get
customer_reviews.author: Jordin Alexis Rachal

customer_reviews.title: It was just like picture
customer_reviews.text: The tail was a little loose but other than that it was fine
customer_reviews.author: david r.

customer_reviews.title: This figure is the freiza during the battle against jiren
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about it. Wished it came with accessories the first editor came with
customer_reviews.author: reggie

customer_reviews.title: WTF!!!!! The leg snapped off
customer_reviews.text: I was moving the leg around and it just snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, it’s a good collectible perfect addition to grab before fakes start to be produced
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Love this figure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this figure! My ONLY complaint would be that you can only use the Halo on one of the heads which isn't ideal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend absolutely loved it, he was delighted with the many different stances and movements that he could do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hollensbe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition, happy I purchased this one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome condition on the box and the figure and accessories are perfect! It’s a great addition to any SH collection.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure a must have!
customer_reviews.text: If you can’t afford the original final form then this is the one to get! I think it’s a must own regardless.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly authentic
customer_reviews.text: The product was as not a fake figure but a true tamashii figure with the official Toeai sticker

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for any DBZ fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this frieza figure looks great with the rest of my s h figuarts dragonball figures

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure!
customer_reviews.text: It was as described and it is a great figure no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this guy on Friday night and he arrived Sunday morning! Everything was packed good and is fully authentic! A++
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, box came in good condition, blast effects look nice, articulation is good, overall it was a good purchase for me

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Freiza
customer_reviews.text: First one I received was defective but the replacement was perfect and arrived very fast.

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a stand
customer_reviews.text: Lots of accessories. The stand fits other figures. Huge dbz fan and I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the figure had poorly painted defects and Fallen right eye
customer_reviews.author: Damián

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this figure its amazing and fits perfectly into my collection. The only bad thing is that the box was damaged and as a collector that sucks. But its only a little bit and just for my one so it will probably be fine for anyone else. The figures articulation is amazing and its accessories are great. You need to buy this figure its just like the old one but cheaper. Get it you need to!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkyscool101

customer_reviews.title: Great figure
customer_reviews.text: Awesome figure. Love it! Does have a blue tint to it. Overall if you’re missing the first release this is a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Tello

product_meta.title: TAMASHII NATIONS Bandai S.H. Figuarts Frieza -Resurrection- Dragon Ball Super Action Figure
product_meta.description: "I am the mighty frieze, and all of the horrible stories you've heard are true!" From the anime Dragon ball Super comes the wild and wildly powerful frieze! His ancient yet ageless evil charm is captured in this action figure, letting fans replicate famed scenes from the series! The figure includes four pairs of optional hands, One set of optional arms, one set of optional legs, Angel's Halo, two optional expressions, tail, two effect parts and one effect part stand, plus a custom base (with a plate, support arm, and clip).
feature_bullets: Two optional expressions, tail, two effect parts and one effect Part stand, plus a custom base (with a plate, support arm, and clip
The figure includes four pairs of optional hands, One set of optional arms, one set of optional legs, Angel's Halo
His ancient yet ageless evil charm is captured in this action figure, letting fans replicate famed scenes from the series
Product bears official Bluefin Distribution logo
